meanings.definition: The state or quality of being hurried or rushed.
meanings.sent1: Her hurriednesses to finish the project caused mistakes.
meanings.sent2: The hurriednesses of the delivery driver were evident in his quick movements.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's hurriednesses to gather nuts made the other animals chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Time flew by in a whirlwind of hurriednesses during the busy day.
meanings.sent5: The hurriednesses of the students to leave class at the bell was like a race.

meanings.definition: Actions or behaviors characterized by haste or speed.
meanings.sent1: The hurriednesses of the chef in the kitchen impressed the diners.
meanings.sent2: In emergencies, the paramedics move with great hurriednesses.
meanings.sent3: The cat's hurriednesses to catch the laser pointer entertained the family.
meanings.sent4: The hurriednesses of the river flowing downstream were mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent5: The hurriednesses of the shoppers on Black Friday created chaos in the store.
